attributes.action: Monitor and have restrictions on AI generated pictures and videos
attributes.additional_details: Because as the rise of AI usage becomes a thing it is becoming harder and harder to determine what looks like AI and what is real, the UK needs to protect its citizens it takes 5 minutes max on the Internet to see deep fakes of random people with children which could ruin someone's life over a "joke" and we need the government to protect us as we elected them to do so.
attributes.background: Monitor the use of AI in the UK and have a potential law that limits AI image and/or video generation to protect children and people from false accusations

rejection.details:
Require generative AI watermarks & ban using people’s likeness without consent
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736690
